title: Version Control System: Working with remotes
description: In this scenario you'll learn basic commands to share the changes in your repository with other people and combine their changes into your repository.

steps.title: Git remote - set url of remote folder
Git fetch - get updates from remote folder, preserving local status
Git merge - merge updates from remote folder to local without conflicts (fast-forward)
Git merge - merge updates from remote folder to local, with automatic-solvable conflicts (non fast-forward)
Git merge - merge updates from remote folder to local, with conflicts to solve manually
Git pull - get and merge updates from remote folder (fetch+merge)
